file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 49-20-60-06 - APU AIR INLET DUCT HOUSING ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU AIR INLET DUCT HOUSING ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection on the APU air inlet duct housing assembly. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH APU APU AIR INLET DUCT HOUSING ASSEM- 49-20-60-200-801-A T-62T-40C11 BLY - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 49-20-60 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 49-20-60-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH APU T-62T-40C11 2. APU AIR INLET DUCT HOUSING ASSEMBLY - INSPECTION A. General (1) The air inlet duct housing assembly has the air intake installed on the APU cowling and the air inlet installed on APU air intake. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 313 APU D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the APU work area 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task APU work area I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: MAKE SURE THAT THE APU CONTROL MASTER SWITCH IS IN THE “OFF” POSITION TO PREVENT AN APU ACCIDENTAL OPERATION. (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: – APU FUEL SOV. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 49-20-60 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) On the left power control and distribution box, open the APU GEN START circuit breaker and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to it. (3) Remove the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400). J. Inspect APU Air Inlet Duct Housing Assembly (Figure 601) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Do a visual check on the air inlet duct housing assembly for cracks, damage, and general conditions. Repair or replace the defective parts, as applicable. (2) Make sure that there are no objects which can block the air inlet duct. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400). (2) Remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags and close these circuit breakers. – APU FUEL SOV. (3) On the left power control and distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag and close the APU GEN START circuit breaker.
